trans-unit.source: Authenticates an <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenner en <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator class to authenticate <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken> security tokens.
trans-unit.target: Bruk X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator-klasse for å godkjenne <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>sikkerhetstokener.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> method is called to authenticate the token, the X.509 certificate is not mapped to a Windows identity and the certificate is validated using a certificate chain.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A>metoden kalles for å godkjenne tokenet, X.509-sertifikatet er ikke tilordnet til en Windows-ID og valideres sertifikatet ved hjelp av en sertifikatkjede.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> class using the specified certificate validator.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av den angitte sertifikatet validereren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator> class provides a set of pre-defined certificate validation models, such as the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.ChainTrust%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator>klassen inneholder et sett med forhåndsdefinert sertifikatet validering modeller som den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.ChainTrust%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.ChainTrust%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator>

trans-unit.source: These validation models can be passed to the `validator` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Disse validering modellene kan sendes til den `validator` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: When an application requires a custom validation method, derive a class from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator> and override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29> method.
trans-unit.target: Når et program krever en egendefinert validering-metode, avledet en klasse fra <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator>og overstyre den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29> method is called by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29>-metoden den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator> does not map the X.509 certificate to a Windows identity.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator>tilordner ikke X.509-sertifikatet til Windows-brukeridentitet.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator"></xref> that verifies that the certificate is valid.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator"> </xref> som kontrollerer at sertifikatet er gyldig.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> class using the specified certificate validation method and indicates whether the identity of the certificate is mapped to a Windows identity.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator"> </xref> klasse med metoden angitte sertifikatet validering og angir om identiteten til sertifikatet er tilordnet til en Windows-brukeridentitet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator> class provides a set of pre-defined certificate validation models, such as the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.ChainTrust%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator>klassen inneholder et sett med forhåndsdefinert sertifikatet validering modeller som den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.ChainTrust%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.ChainTrust%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator>

trans-unit.source: These validation models can be passed to the `validator` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Disse validering modellene kan sendes til den `validator` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: When an application requires a custom validation method, derive a class from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator> and override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29> method.
trans-unit.target: Når et program krever en egendefinert validering-metode, avledet en klasse fra <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator>og overstyre den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29> method is called by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29>-metoden den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> method is called to authenticate the token and `mapToWindows` is `true`, the X.509 certificate is mapped to a Windows account and claims are added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext> with the Windows groups that the user belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A>metoden kalles for å godkjenne tokenet og `mapToWindows` er `true`X.509-sertifikatet er tilordnet til en Windows-konto og krav er lagt til i <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext>med Windows-gruppene som brukeren tilhører.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: How the X.509 certificate is mapped to a Windows account depends upon the security token type: - When the security token is of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken>, the X.509 certificate is mapped using the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken.WindowsIdentity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvordan X.509-sertifikatet er tilordnet til en Windows-konto avhengig sikkerhet tokentypen: – når sikkerhetstokenet er av typen <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken>, X.509-sertifikatet er tilordnes ved hjelp av den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken.WindowsIdentity%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken.WindowsIdentity%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: - When the security token is of type `X509SecurityToken`, the X.509 certificate is mapped to a Windows account using its user principal name (UPN).
trans-unit.target: -Når sikkerhetstokenet er av typen `X509SecurityToken`, X.509-sertifikatet er tilordnet til en Windows-konto ved hjelp av brukerhovednavnet (UPN).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator"></xref> that verifies that the certificate is valid.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator"> </xref> som kontrollerer at sertifikatet er gyldig.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to map the identity of the certificate to a Windows identity; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>ikke tilordne identiteten til sertifikatet til en Windows-brukeridentitet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> class using the specified certificate validation method and indicates whether the identity of the certificate is mapped to a Windows identity and the Windows groups the user belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator"> </xref> klasse med metoden angitte sertifikatet validering og angir om identiteten til sertifikatet er tilordnet til en Windows-ID og Windows-grupper som brukeren tilhører.

trans-unit.source: Pass `false` to the `includeWindowsGroups` parameter when the Windows group information is not required to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: Sende `false` til den `includeWindowsGroups` parameteren når Windows grupperer informasjonen ikke er nødvendig for å forbedre ytelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator> class has several static properties, such as the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.ChainTrust%2A> property that can be passed to the `validator` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator>klassen har flere statiske egenskaper, som den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.ChainTrust%2A>-egenskap som kan sendes til den `validator` parameteren.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.ChainTrust%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator>

trans-unit.source: These properties provide common validation methods for X.509 certificates.
trans-unit.target: Disse egenskapene angi vanlige validering metoder for X.509-sertifikater.

trans-unit.source: When a custom validation method is required, derive a class from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator> and override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29> method.
trans-unit.target: Når det kreves en egendefinert validering-metode, avledet en klasse fra <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator>og overstyre den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29> method is called by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29>-metoden den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29>

trans-unit.source: When `true` is passed into the `mapToWindows` parameter, the X.509 certificate is mapped to a Windows account and relevant claims are added to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext>, such as the Windows groups that the user belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Når `true` er sendt til den `mapToWindows` parameteren X.509-sertifikatet er tilordnet til en Windows-konto og relevante krav er lagt til i <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext>, blant annet Windows grupper som brukeren tilhører.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.EvaluationContext>

trans-unit.source: When the security token is of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken>, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken.WindowsIdentity%2A> property is using the identity that is specified in the token; otherwise, the X.509 certificate is mapped to a Windows identity using a Kerberos S4U logon based on the user principal name SubjectAltNames extension of the X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Når sikkerhetstokenet er av typen <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken.WindowsIdentity%2A>egenskapen bruker identiteten som er angitt i tokenet; ellers X.509-sertifikatet er tilordnet til en Windows-brukeridentitet ved hjelp av en Kerberos S4U-pålogging basert på brukeren hovednavn SubjectAltNames filtypen X.509-sertifikatet.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken.WindowsIdentity%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509WindowsSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator"></xref> that verifies that the certificate is valid.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator"> </xref> som kontrollerer at sertifikatet er gyldig.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to map the identity of the certificate to a Windows identity; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>ikke tilordne identiteten til sertifikatet til en Windows-brukeridentitet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the groups the Windows user belongs to in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.ClaimSets*> property that is constructed throughout the authentication process; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>inkludere grupper Windows brukeren hører til i den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.ClaimSets*>egenskap som er generert i hele godkjenningsprosessen; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext.ClaimSets*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified security token can be validated by this security token authenticator.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den angitte sikkerhetskode kan valideres av denne Sikkerhetstokengodkjenneren.

trans-unit.source: The CanValidateTokenCore method does not authenticate the security token; that is performed by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CanValidateTokenCore godkjenne ikke sikkerhetstokenet; som utføres av den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to be validated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> godkjennes.

trans-unit.source: when token is a security token or a class that derives from ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Når token er en sikkerhetskode eller en klasse som er avledet fra ; ellers .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether to map the X.509 certificate to a Windows account.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om du vil tilordne X.509-sertifikatet til en Windows-konto.

trans-unit.source: The MapCertificateToWindowsAccount property can only be set in a constructor.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen MapCertificateToWindowsAccount kan bare angis i en konstruktør.

trans-unit.source: If transport-level SSL or HTTPS security is being used and mapping is already provided by the underlying security channel or by Internet Information Services (IIS), then that mapping is applied with no chain-validation.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det brukes transportnivå SSL- eller HTTPS sikkerhet og tilordningen er allerede angitt av den underliggende sikkerhetskanal eller av Internet Information Services (IIS), brukes tilordningen med ingen kjede-validering.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, prior to doing the mapping, the certificate is validated using a certificate chain, and the certificate must chain to an NT_AUTHORITY identity.
trans-unit.target: Ellers valideres sertifikatet ved hjelp av en sertifikatkjede før du gjør tilordningen, og sertifikatet må koble til en NT_AUTHORITY identitet.

trans-unit.source: The chain structure used corresponds to the CERT_CHAIN_POLICY_NT_AUTH as defined in the `CertVerifyCertificateChainPolicy` function (see the [CertVerifyCertificateChainPolicy](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=83570) function in the Cryptography SDK).
trans-unit.target: Kjede-strukturen som ble brukt samsvarer med CERT_CHAIN_POLICY_NT_AUTH som er definert i den `CertVerifyCertificateChainPolicy` funksjonen (se den [CertVerifyCertificateChainPolicy](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=83570) -funksjonen i kryptografi SDK).

trans-unit.source: This behavior only occurs when mapping a certificate to a Windows account.
trans-unit.target: Dette skjer bare under tilordning av et sertifikat til Windows-kontoer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to map the X.509 certificate to a Windows account; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>ikke tilordne X.509-sertifikatet til en Windows-kontoen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Authenticates the specified security token and returns the set of authorization policies for the security token.
trans-unit.target: Godkjenner angitte sikkerhetstokenet, og returnerer settet med godkjenning policyer for sikkerhetstokenet.

trans-unit.source: When the ValidateTokenCore method is overridden, follow these guidelines: - When the security token passed into the `token` parameter cannot be validated, throw the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Når metoden ValidateTokenCore overstyres, følger du retningslinjene: – når sikkerhetstokenet som ble sendt til den `token` parameteren kan ikke validere, Iverksett den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>unntak.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>

trans-unit.source: - When there are no authorization policies in effect for this application, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>.
trans-unit.target: -Når det finnes ingen godkjenning policyer som gjelder for dette programmet, returneres en tom <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>av typen <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: When `null` is returned by this method, [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] throws the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Når `null` returneres av denne metoden [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] oppstår det <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>unntak.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>

trans-unit.source: The ValidateTokenCore method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29> method of the validation method specified in the constructor to authenticate the `token` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Metodekall ValidateTokenCore den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29>metoden for Valideringsmetoden er angitt i konstruktøren for å godkjenne den `token` parameteren.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator.Validate%28System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to be validated.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> godkjennes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref> that contains the set of authorization policies in effect for this application.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> av typen <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"> </xref> som inneholder settet med godkjenning policyer som gjelder for dette programmet.
